blogPost.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US were down 6% over the past week, the 65th consecutive day of week-over-week declines. Down 73% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/nJz69uqnQR
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 过去一周美国科维德-19住院人数下降6%，这是连续第65天周环比下降。较1月6日的峰值下降73%。🙏 https://t.co/nJz69uqnQR。
過去一週美國科維德-19住院人數下降6%，這是連續第65天周環比下降。較1月6日的峯值下降73%。🙏 https://t.co/nJz69uqnQR。
